text: hi everyone is Helen here as you know
kingston ramen noodles is a kitchen
stable from all of us especially for
college students right
but once the seasoning mix pack that
come with it becomes so standard and
boring what can we do to elevate the
dish today let's make instant ramen
great again let's begin the ingredients
you're gonna need 2 pack of instant
ramen you can choose any brand as you
like a tablespoon of dry streams which
should be soaked in warm water for about
15 minutes for the topping you can have
shrimp beef pork mushrooms or any kind
of proteins as you like even tofu you
also need some spring onions and eggs
and some beef ball or fish ball in a
mortar and pestle combine the salt dried
shrimps and half a teaspoon each of salt
sugar and chicken stock and two fried
chillies crush finally into a paste you
can also use a food processor for this
step next in a pan heat 1 tablespoon of
vegetable oil until it's nice and hot
and then add a tablespoon of minced
garlic and shallot and fry until
fragrant then add the crushed spring mix
and stir for about 30 seconds over low
heat
they might slump up but that's okay just
turn off the heat and drain off the oil
leave to cool and then when it's cool
you can crush it again to make it
crumply next bring a saucepan of water
to a rolling boil then cook the instant
ramen for about 2 to 4 minutes as per
packet instruction then remove the
noodles with a slotted spoon and
transfer to a bowl and discard the water
we're not gonna eat the water that we
boil the noodles in but will bring
another 2 cups of fresh water to a boil
and then add the fish or beef ball I
like to cut a cross incision on top of
the beef more so it's easier to
later then also after shrimps and cook
for a couple of minutes until they turn
orange completely then remove and top
the noodle bowl next blanch the beef
quickly in the boiling water just as
soon as it changes color remove and
transfer to top the noodle bowl instead
of the beef or stream you can also use
other proteins like chicken mushrooms
tofu etc for the vegetables here I only
use scallion but you can also use other
vegetables like bean sprouts or shredded
cabbage for the scallion and attached
the white and the green part and for the
white part I just split up and then for
the green part just finely chopped at
normal we want to blanch the white part
of the spring onion or also bean sprouts
and cabbage if you're using until it's
quite soft and then also top the noodle
both then also add the crushed chilli
soft meat it's very fragrant and very
flavorful
finally keep the heat to very low and
gently stir the water with a chopstick
to create a world and then crack the
eggs and drop into the center just post
the ad there for about three to four
minutes and then remove with a slotted
spoon and top the noodle bowls
garnish with some chopped green onion
and some fried shallots if you like for
the soup you can ladle to a small bowl
and serve as an accompany and a few
drops of fish sauce
some chopped green onions and pepper to
garnish to serve just break the eggs to
enjoy that using moments mix well and
